message: Eric, its not necessarily the fact that this child is praying to God that restores faith in humanity. Its about the selfless actions of this little boy, who chose to ask for a miracle for someone else instead of a toy for himself. Even those who don't believe in God, or have a different god can appreciate this selfless act and see it as having faith in humanity.
